Name.value: Ghussak - Exchange Items into NPC currency

Description.value: A simple placeable trading block to exchange any items into a currency that hireable NPCs accept.\n This also changes the world currency to become a workaround that lets pseudo item's exchange happen: instead of exchanging everything thru a currency coin, it works like exchanging one specific item amount by another amount or group of items (like the currency would be a virtual value and the exchange happens after the trader agrees with it, and only item for another item).\n
